member.name: BlackInformation
member.summary: Contains information for device models that have a black color channel.

summary.para: A value between 0.0 and 1.0 that indicates the relative amount of black to use in the output. A value of 0.0 means that no black is used; a value of 1.0 means that the maximum amount of black is used.
An indicator whether the source color contains only black. This value can only be true if both of the following apply:

item.description: the source device has a black channel
the PRESERVEBLACK flag is set to true. This flag is in the dwFlags parameter of a Color Management Module (CMM) transform function.
